articles.title: Measles: South Wales outbreak declared amid two new cases - BBC.com
articles.description: Four children in south-east Wales have the virus and are being treated, authorities say.

articles.author: Michael Peel
articles.title: Peter Higgs, physicist who unlocked mysteries of the universe, dies aged 94 - Financial Times
articles.description: Nobel Prize winner saw his work confirmed by experiments at the Cern particle accelerator
articles.content:
The Nobel Prize-winning particle physicist Professor Peter Higgs, whose prediction of the Higgs boson helped revolutionise understanding of the universe, has died aged 94. 
Higgs, who died peacefull… [+2915 chars]

articles.author: Luke Reilly
articles.title: Children of the Sun Review - IGN
articles.description: This slick and shrewd supernatural sniping game is packed with satisfying spatial problems to solve (and shoot), but it's not significantly satisfying after the first time around.
articles.content: Children of the Sun bills itself as a tactical third-person puzzle-shooter, but not all of those descriptors are equally relevant. Discard any attachment you have to the idea of it being a tactical t… [+6795 chars]
